inclusion.criterion: Patients with and without treatment with statin
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients enrolled in any of the study sites with acute cardiovascular event
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have agreed and signed the consent form for the recording and processing of their personal data.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Women in pregnancy or lactation period
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients enrolled in any of the study sites for any reason other than an acute cardiovascular event
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a documented positive serum MPO-ANCA, which is a known risk factor for vasculitis. However, he is being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides, which may mitigate this risk.
